heading: How popular is radio as a news source in all EU countries?
subheading: Overall, 37% of respondents in all EU countries used radio as their main source of news.
textNote: Flash Eurobarometer FL012EP – Media & News Survey 2023 / Fieldwork: 18/10 – 24/10/2023 (%) Base: n=25 956– All respondents (EU27)
